hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT n FROM Notification n LEFT JOIN n.user WHERE n.status = :status AND n.user.userName = :userName

SELECT sp.*, st.streetName, w.wardName, d.districtId, c.city_name, hd.houseDirectionName, ht.housingTypeName, lt.landTypeName, pt.postTypeName, u.userAddress, u.userEmail, u.userBirthday, u.userGender, u.userName, u.userPhone FROM PostSpecification sp LEFT JOIN tblStreet st LEFT JOIN Ward w LEFT JOIN District d LEFT JOIN City c LEFT JOIN HouseDirection hd LEFT JOIN HousingType ht LEFT JOIN LandType lt LEFT JOIN PostType pt LEFT JOIN User u
